      public Server(ThreadGroup group, int port, int backlog, InetAddress bindAddress, ISocketAcceptHandler handler) throws IOException
      Parameters:

      port - port
      backlog - backlog
      bindAddress - a bindAddress
      handler - the socket accept handler
      Throws:
      IOException - if server setup cannot be done
